SEARCH
Package utility

Class Printer

java.lang.Object
utility.Printer
public class Printer extends Object
Printer handles the printing of Cards in a horizontal format with ANSI color codes. This class loads card designs from AsciiArt and supports printing individual or multiple Cards in lines.

  • Field Summary

    static Map<String,List<String>>
    colorToCard
    Stores card listSegmentlates (7-line designs) for each color

  • Method Details

    • getCardPrinted

      public static String getCardPrinted(List<Card> partOfList)
      Prints a horizontal line of Cards. If a card is null, a blank space will be printed instead.
      Parameters:
      partOfList - A sublist of Cards to be printed in one row.
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing the row of Cards.

    • printLine

      public static String printLine(List<Card> listOfCard)
      This handles the card printing for ParadeLine and for the Player's hand.
      Parameters:
      listOfCard - Contains the amount of Cards needed to be printed.
      Returns:
      String containing the printed cards.

    • lineToPrint

      public static String lineToPrint(int lineNo, int value, String color)
      Depending on the color and the line of Card to be printed, print the specific design of the color.
      Parameters:
      lineNo - Line number where the Card should be printed.
      value - Value of the Card.
      color - Color of the Card.
      Returns:
      String containing the horizontal part of that one specific Card.
